sentences.en: Also during that year, Nino Valenti died of a cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 另外,在那一年里, 尼诺-华伦提脑溢血死了.

sentences.en: An author, but not an intellectual, he was irritated by writing he thought too cerebral.
sentences.cn: 由于他是作家而非学者, 他讨厌他认为耐人思考的作品.

sentences.en: Anything requiring more cerebral strain passed her by.
sentences.cn: 任何需要动脑的事,她都不干.

sentences.en: Cerebral palsy is a terrible disabler.
sentences.cn: 脑性麻痹是使人残废的可怕病因.

sentences.en: His mature compositions are generally considered the more cerebral and crabbed.
sentences.cn: 他成熟的作品一般被认为是触动理智的和难于理解的.

sentences.en: Leptin improved animal body weight recovery and behavioral parameters after cerebral ischemia.
sentences.cn: 来普汀能改善脑缺血后的动物体重恢复及行为指标.

sentences.en: Objective To study whether patients with schizophrenia have cerebral injury.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨精神分裂症患者是否有脑损伤.

sentences.en: Prolonged or recurrent, uncontrolled, excessive exposure can result in a slow, progressive cerebral incompetence.
sentences.cn: 长期暴露或重复暴露, 无控制暴露以及过度暴露都可能引起慢性的 、 逐渐发展的大脑不适.

sentences.en: Results About 7 % of total cerebral aneurysms could cause isolated third nerve palsy.
sentences.cn: 结果动脉瘤致孤立性动眼神经麻痹的发生率约占全部动脉瘤7%.

sentences.en: The doctors speculate that he died of a cerebral haemorrhage caused by a blow on the head.
sentences.cn: 医生推测他死于头部受击引起的脑溢血。

sentences.en: The patient died from acute cerebral haemorrhage.
The patient died from acute cerebral hemorrhage.
Washington struck me as a precarious place from which to publish such a cerebral newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我的感觉是，在华盛顿出版这样一份理性的报纸不是太靠谱。

sentences.en: Your left cerebral hemisphere controls the right - hand side of your body.
sentences.cn: 你的左半脑控制身体的右半身.

trans.tran_cn: 大脑的，脑的，理智的，非感情方面的
trans.tran_en: relating to or affecting your brain
